extendedInfo.description: Capture jewels with this gem swapping game! Line up matching jewels to capture them, or if you're stuck use a special like the spear or vine.The statistics make it fun and easy to track your wealth. Enjoy fantastic graphics and entertaining sound effects while capturing heaps of jewels.â¦â¦â¦ FEATURES â¦â¦â¦â¢ Tracks tons of statistics!â¢ Tutorials available to get you started!â¢ Vibrant and attractive graphics!â¢ Specials include net, spear, vine, concrete block, and more!â¢ Tumbling gems create huge captures!â¦â¦â¦ Permissions requested and how they are used â¦â¦â¦â¢  android.permission.INTERNET: This permission is used to: 1) link to our website, 2) link to social networking like Twitter and Facebook, 3) update leaderboards, 4) collect gameplay data that we use to improve our games, and 5) allow ad networks that advertise within the app.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: This permission is used primarily to check for a network connection before attempting to connect to our website.â¢  android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This permission allows the app to access game data saved on an external storage device.â¢  android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards that can be used across all of our applications.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards for tablets that do not have telephone information.â¢  android.permission.VIBRATE: This permission is used to access vibration functionality on the device.

reviews.title: Sooo addicting, love it
reviews.comment: Great relaxing game. I enjoy playing classic mode where I can play at my own pace w/o being timed like most games ^_^
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problem please fix
reviews.comment: I bought this games. I can\'t play it. It won\'t open. It keeps going closed everytime I try to play it. Please fix or I want my money back.  Thank you!
reviews.author: Sherry Geesaman

reviews.title: Saved my husbands life :)
reviews.comment: Awesome relaxer when my husband is acting up. Instead of arguing, I just play and ignore!  :) Great game though,, not too hard but not too easy,, its just right.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mega-awesome and ad-free
reviews.comment: Super fancy graphics and great gameplay, and it has no ads (bug?) , which is great. Only the gems are very small and it\'s sometimes hard to touch the right one - it\'d be best on a tablet.
reviews.author: Ond\305\231ej Hru\305\241ka

reviews.title: Used to like it
reviews.comment: I used to like it, but there are so many long annoying ads i wont play anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Great game fun to play I especially like the specials
reviews.author: Allen Hill II

reviews.title: aces jewel hunt
reviews.comment: Really enjoy the hunt! Very challenging.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aces Jewel Hunt
reviews.comment: I love this game! It makes me think what move to make next. Exciting gameplay that makes it hard to put down. Addicting as most all games I keep on my phone. This DEV & TEAM are Awesome!!! Please keep them coming =+) Need to develop some hidden object games too if possible.
reviews.author: Karen Shrang

reviews.title: Annoying!
reviews.comment: Why does it save your games just \"sometimes\" and others you get sent back to level one?!  You should be able to resume ur game at any level.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Carol
reviews.comment: Awesome app!  Another Great thing about this app, you don\'t have to wait on another player, that could take DAYS!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Enjoy the challenge
reviews.comment: Relaxes me after and full day at work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!!! but one complaint.....
reviews.comment: This game has stood the test of time for me. Other games come and go, but I always seem to return to this super fun & unique jewel game. Always trying to beat my highest score! Please get support for Nexus 7 for the paid version plleeease!! I HATE the ADS popping up in the middle of my games!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So fun!
reviews.comment: I like this game cuz it\'s different then all the other ones with all the cool special moves you can do. Too fun! Very addicting! Good job guys!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addicting!
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t put out down! Love this game. Even better...our was free!

reviews.title: Good way to kill time
reviews.comment: Entertaining and easy

reviews.comment: Lovely little game,great graphics,just a shame its not full size.
